data.name: GetVideoQuery
data.value: select V.ID as VideoID, V.[Status] as VideoStatus from Videos V where V.ID = @VideoID

data.name: GetVideos
data.value: SELECT ID, [Status], EncodingStartedAt, EncodingEndedAt FROM [Videos] WHERE ID in (select TRIM(value) from string_split(@IDs,','))

data.name: HandoutQuery
data.value: SELECT top 100 f.ID as FileID, f.[Name] as [FileName], f.[FilePath], f.[Sequence] as FileSequence, f.[Type] as FileType, f.[Status] as FileStatus, f.[CreatedAt] as FileCreatedAt, f.[CreatedBy] as FileCreatedBy, f.[UpdatedBy] as FileUpdatedBy, f.[UpdatedAt] as FileUpdatedAt, f.EntityID as ChapterID, c.Title as ChapterTitle, c.PaperID, p.Title as PaperTitle, CONCAT(t.FirstName, ' ', t.LastName) as Trainer, p.CourseID, co.Title as CourseTitle, co.QualificationID, q.Title as QualificationTitle, f.IsDelete as FileDeleted, c.IsDelete as ChapterDeleted, p.IsDelete as PaperDeleted, co.IsDelete as CourseDeleted, q.IsDelete as QualificationDeleted, Concat(us.FirstName, ' ' ,us.LastName) as FullName FROM [Files] f JOIN [Chapter] c on f.EntityID = c.ID join [Paper] p on c.PaperID = p.ID join [user] t on p.TutorID = t.ID join [Course] co on p.CourseID = co.ID join [Qualification] q on co.QualificationID = q.ID join [User] us on us.ID = f.CreatedBy WHERE f.InstituteID = @InstituteID and f.[Entity] = 'Chapter' AND f.[EntityID] = COALESCE(@ChapterID, [EntityID]) AND c.PaperID = COALESCE(@PaperID, c.PaperID) AND f.[Name] = COALESCE(@FileTitle, f.[Name])

data.name: LectureDetailsQuery
data.value: select top 1 l.ID as LectureID, l.Title as LectureTitle, l.[Status] as LectureStatus, ld.CustomField1 as VideoID, (l.[duration] / 60) as DurationInMins, Size as SizeInMB, CEILING((l.[Size] / (l.[duration] / 60))) as MBsPerMinute, CEILING(((l.[Size] * 8) / (l.[duration] / 60)))/60 as ApproximateInternetSpeedRequiredInMbps, l.[StartDate], l.EndDate, l.CreatedAt, l.CreatedBy, cb.Email as CreatedByEmail, CONCAT(cb.FirstName, ' ', cb.LastName) as CreatedByName, l.UpdatedAt, l.UpdatedBy, ub.Email as UpdatedByEmail, CONCAT(ub.FirstName, ' ', ub.LastName) as UpdatedByName, l.ChapterID, c.Title as ChapterTitle, c.PaperID, p.Title as PaperTitle, CONCAT(t.FirstName, ' ', t.LastName) as Trainer, p.CourseID, co.Title as CourseTitle, co.QualificationID, q.Title as QualificationTitle, l.IsDelete as LectureDeleted, c.IsDelete as ChapterDeleted, p.IsDelete as PaperDeleted, co.IsDelete as CourseDeleted, q.IsDelete as QualificationDeleted from [lecture] l join [user] cb on l.CreatedBy = cb.ID join [user] ub on l.UpdatedBy = ub.ID join [lecturedetail] ld on ld.LectureID = l.ID join [chapter] c on l.ChapterID = c.ID join [Paper] p on c.PaperID = p.ID join [user] t on p.TutorID = t.ID join [Course] co on p.CourseID = co.ID join [Qualification] q on co.QualificationID = q.ID where l.InstituteID = @InstituteID and l.TypeID = 38 and l.ID = COALESCE(@LectureID, l.ID) and l.ChapterID = COALESCE(@ChapterID, l.ChapterID) and c.PaperID = COALESCE(@PaperID, c.PaperID) and l.Title = COALESCE(@LectureTitle, l.Title)

data.name: LVLQuery
data.value: select lvl.ID as LectureViewID, lvl.LectureID, ld.CustomField1 as VideoID, lvl.LogAt, concat(co.Title, ' (', p.Title, ')') as Course, c.Title as Chapter, l.Title as Lecture, (l.[duration] / 60) as DurationInMins, Size as SizeInMB, CEILING((l.[Size] / (l.[duration] / 60))) as MBsPerMinute, CEILING(((l.[Size] * 8) / (l.[duration] / 60)))/60 as ApproximateInternetSpeedRequiredInMbps, l.[StartDate], l.EndDate, l.CreatedAt as LectureCreatedAt from [lectureviewlog] lvl join Institute Inst on Inst.ID = lvl.InstituteId join [User] u on u.ID = lvl.UserID join lecture l on lvl.LectureID = l.ID join [lecturedetail] ld on ld.lectureid = l.id join [chapter] c on l.chapterid = c.id join [paper] p on c.paperid = p.id join [course] co on p.courseid = co.id where u.Email = COALESCE(@UserEmail , u.Email) and Inst.ID = @InstituteID and lvl.UserID = COALESCE(@UserID, lvl.UserID) and lvl.logat > dateadd(day, (-1 * @NoOfDays), getdate()) and l.TypeID = 38 order by lvl.LogAt desc

data.name: UserDeviceInfoQuery
data.value: Select UD.UserID as UserID, UD.DeviceID as DeviceID, UD.DeviceInfo as DeviceInfo, UD.[Status] as DeviceStatus, UD.CreatedAt as CreatedAt, UD.UpdatedAt as UpdatedAt from UserDevices UD where UD.UserID = @UserID and UD.IsDelete = 0

data.name: UserInfoQuery
data.value: Select U.ID as UserID, U.Email as UserEmail, U.FirstName as FirstName, U.LastName as LastName from [User] U where U.InstituteID = @InstituteID and U.Email = COALESCE(@UserEmail, U.Email) AND [IsDelete] = 0 ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC
